title: Flair (Italian mag)
content:
Does anyone know what font this magazine uses? I am OBSESSED with it. Was it designed specifically (and exclusively) for them?

Thx.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824065509im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Flair_3772.cover.jpg)
author: mtm

comments.content: Clearly not the same but similar to [Perla](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824065509/http:/www.alias.uk.com/perla_frameset.html) from alias
